name: People Power
overview:
Award winning People Power is the universal remote control for the Internet of Things delivering intuitive mobile apps and cloud based software putting device monitoring and control in the palm of your hands.

People Power makes products better for manufacturers and service providers by enriching features and providing remote monitoring and control from any mobile device. We put the Internet of Things to work for the people creating fantastic out-of-box and daily use experiences that provide new features, convenience, and efficiency never before possible. People Power Cloud - the world’s best cloud for connecting devices to the internet creates value by reliably connecting devices and making information better with analytics.

  • People Power Apps - award winning apps are beautiful, intuitive, and make engaging with internet connected devices an interesting conversation for consumers.

  • People Power APIs - are open source and developer friendly making it easy for manufacturers and service providers to connect and start sending/receiving data/commands.

  • People Power Command Center - is the easy-to-use configuration admin tool in the cloud to manage internet connected devices significantly reducing development time and costs.

  • Winner of AT&T’s Power Your Future contest for the best energy management application and GE Eco-Imagination award for behavioral science based controls of energy use.

  • Connected devices running People Power put a simple and compelling product experience in the hands of consumers, delivering convenience and control from anywhere, anytime.
